title: Missing skin
body: i bought a skin Jinx Starguardian and now i can't use it. but i still see that i purchased that skin in purchase history . Please help me

replies.body:
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

I've pulled up your account and I do see where you purchased Star Guardian Jinx today, but it looks like she got a bit too out of control and never quite made it into your inventory. Go ahead and reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we should be able to get that sorted out!
